price: (У) ерни ва буюк самоларни яратган Зот тарафидан нозил қилингандир.
arabic: تَنزِيلٗا مِّمَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ ٱلۡعُلَى

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: tanzīlan mimman khalaqa al-arḍa wal-samāwāti al-ʿulā
